title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8186-15.12 - State Board review of proposed findings and determinations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8186-15.12 - State Board review of proposed findings and determinations

State Regulations
(a) The State Board
shall review all proposed findings and determinations submitted to it, and
shall approve those findings and determinations it finds acceptable at a
meeting of such board at the same time it establishes final State equalization
rates, class equalization rates or class ratios, pursuant to section
1210
of the Real Property Tax Law, for the
complainants to which the findings and determinations apply. (b) Where the State Board determines the
proposed findings and determinations to be unacceptable, it shall return the
same to ORPTS staff for additional review and redrafting as the State Board
deems necessary. ORPTS staff shall proceed as directed by the State Board and
prepare revised staff reports, resolutions, or findings and determinations, as
appropriate. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
8186-15.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
